attributes.action: The policing and removal of websites inciting racial hatred
attributes.additional_details: As citizens of the UK we vehemently oppose the numerous websites supporting and justifying racial hatred. Whilst we are aware that the internet proves difficult to police it is our view that when such websites are brought to the attention of British Police Officers it is their duty to remove the websites and carry out the necessary investigations in order to bring to justice those who continue to pollute our environment with racial hatred.
